Tool

Name12: First steps with shapes
ID11
AuthorCopyrights (c) 2003 by Olaf Conrad

Description

Copy a shapes layer and move it to a new position. (c) 2003 by Olaf Conrad, Goettingen email: oconrad@gwdg.de

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Input Shapes (input)INPUTThis must be your input data of type shapes.
Output
OutputShapes (output)OUTPUTThis will contain your output data of type shapes.
Options
Translation: XFloating pointDXDefault: 10.000000
Translation: YFloating pointDYDefault: 10.000000
